animal.question: I wag my tail and bark. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🐾 I have four legs.
🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🏡 I live in a kennel.

animal.question: I say 'Moo' and give milk. I like to eat grass. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have black and white spots.
🥛 I give you milk to drink.
🌾 I eat grass in a field.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. I have webbed feet. What am I?

hints.text: 🐥 I am yellow when I am little.
🦆 I have a wide, flat beak.
💦 I love being in water.

animal.question: I purr and chase mice. I like to drink milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like playing with yarn.
🐈 I have pointy ears and whiskers.
🐟 Sometimes I eat fish.

animal.question: I roar and live in the jungle. I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane.
🍖 I like to eat meat.
🦁 My roar can be heard far away.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. I like to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 I have a fluffy tail.
🥕 I wiggle my nose when I eat.
🌱 I love to eat greens.

animal.question: I am a big, gray animal with a trunk. I live in Africa and Asia. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I use my trunk to drink water.
🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐾 I have large feet.

animal.question: I hiss and slither on the ground. Some of us are venomous. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin.
🥚 I hatch from an egg.
🌿 I can be found in many habitats.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. I look like a horse, but I'm not. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique to each animal.
🌿 I eat grass on the African savanna.
💨 I can run very fast.

animal.question: I am a large bird that cannot fly. I can run very fast. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I am the fastest bird on land.
🥚 I lay the largest eggs of any living bird.
🌍 I am native to Africa.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white, what am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of frozen water.
⛄ You can make a snowman with me.
🏂 You can play in me and slide down a hill!

weather.question: I am water that falls from the sky. You need an umbrella when I come by. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ I make puddles on the ground.
🌧️ I help plants grow.
💧 I come from clouds.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and give you warmth. I shine bright during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I help plants grow.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌞 I disappear at night.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ Airplanes fly through me.
🐑 I sometimes look like sheep.
🌦️ I can block the sun.

weather.question: I move the leaves on the trees and help kites fly high. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🌬️ You can't see me, but you can feel me.
🪁 I help sailboats move across the water.

weather.question: I am a storm with lots of wind and rain. Sometimes there is thunder and lightning. What am I?

hints.text: ⛈️ It's best to stay inside when I arrive.
⚡ You might see flashes of light.
🔊 You might hear loud booms.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc that appears after it rains. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
✨ I often appear when the sun is shining through rain.
🍀 People say there's a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I am frozen rain. I am smaller than snow, but harder. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can hurt if I hit you!
🚗 Cars slow down when I fall.
🥶 I'm formed in cold thunderstorms.

weather.question: I am a giant swirling storm over the ocean. I have very strong winds. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 My name starts with an 'H'.
🚢 Ships try to avoid me.
🏠 I can cause a lot of damage if I hit land.

weather.question: I am a very cold and strong storm with lots of snow and wind. What am I?

hints.text: 🧤 You need to bundle up when I come.
🐻 Animals often hibernate when I arrive.
🧣 I can cause blizzards.
